short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clean up Canva by adding a grey overlay on top of premium elements. No more accidentally including premium content in your designs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simply adds a grey overlay to premium elements in Canva, letting you know which elements are "paid" and which are free.
